snippet: Some universities are using their art collections, and sometimes artists, for novel purposes, link honing a medical student’s observation and description skills through the examination of artwork.
abstract: Some university museum directors are deploying their extensive art collections, and in some cases the artists themselves, to enhance university curriculums.
lead_paragraph: Some universities are using their art collections, and sometimes artists, for novel purposes, link honing a medical student’s observation and description skills through the examination of artwork.

headline.seo: Art Museums Augment Some Courses at Universities
headline.main: Art Museums Giving It the Old College Try
headline.print_headline: Art Museums Giving It the Old College Try
